reference.title: DITAMap API Module
reference.shortdesc: This element provides describe the relationships within a collection of specialization topics of an application programming interface (API).

refbody.section:
Description
Maps can be used to drive processing for the collection (for example, transforming all the referenced topics into HTML, or producing a PDF for the collection), generate navigation files (for example, Eclipse or HTML Help tables of contents), and manage the related links among the topics. The topics can be organized into subdirectories (for example, a /universal directory, /java/ directory, /java/interface/ and /java/class, and so on). The topic directories can be nested to any level, as long as the map is defined at a level that contains them all.
Universal API Specialization: apiPackage, apiClassifier, apiOperation, and apiValue topic types.
Java API Specialization: javaPackage, javaClass, javaInterface, javaMethod and javaField topic types.
C++ API Specialization: Library, Header, Namespace, Class, Typesdef, Structure, Union, Function, Method, Constant, Enumeration , Member Variable and Parameter topic types.
